item.title: üåê Universal Parser (Pro)
item.description:
Note: The Universal Parser is only available in DefectDojo Pro.

The Universal Parser is currently in Beta. See our announcement presentation for more information.

item.title: Generic Findings Import
item.description: You can use Generic Findings Import as a method to ingest JSON or CSV files into DefectDojo which are not already in the supported parsers list.
